summary: Append a value to an array
description: Appends a new value to the end of the array, which may also include a new label for labeled arrays.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to append to the array.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: If the given array is a labeled array, a new label for the new value should be given. If not given or `null`, the array index as string is used as the label. If in any case the label exists, a `LabelExists` exception is thrown.

returns.description: The new array with the value being appended.

LabelExists.message: An array element with the specified label already exists.
